title: Mobile-Based Intensive Short-Term Course for Specialized Mathematics Terminology Learning

context.additional_context: Constructing a repetitive feedback-based learning environment using mobile devices and SNS for entry-level professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can translate five or more specialized mathematics terms per week with 90% accuracy via a mobile app
Learners complete a learning portfolio incorporating peer feedback from three or more SNS-based collaborative activities
Through project-based assessment, learners present cases applying mathematical concepts to real workplace scenarios with 80% completion fidelity
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
